His <S%G846><s%> brothers <S%G80><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "Depart <S%G3327><s%> from here, <S%G1782><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> go <S%G5217><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Judea, <S%G2449><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> may see <S%G2334><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you <S%G4675><s%> do. <S%G4160><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> no one <S%G3762><s%> does <S%G4160><s%> anything <S%G5100><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> secret, <S%G2927><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2212><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> seeks <S%G2212><s%> to be known <S%G1511><s%> <S%G1722><s%> openly. <S%G3954><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> you do <S%G4160><s%> these things, <S%G5023><s%> reveal <S%G5319><s%> yourself <S%G4572><s%> to the world. <S%G2889><s%>"
For <S%G1063><s%> even his <S%G846><s%> brothers <S%G80><s%> didn't <S%G4100><s%> <S%G3761><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

The world <S%G2889><s%> can't <S%G3756><s%> hate <S%G3404><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> it <S%G1473><s%> hates <S%G3404><s%> me, <S%G1691><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> testify <S%G3140><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> it, <S%G846><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> its <S%G846><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> evil. <S%G4190><s%>

You <S%G5210><s%> go <S%G305><s%> up <S%G305><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3778><s%> feast. <S%G1859><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am not <S%G3768><s%> yet <S%G3768><s%> going <S%G305><s%> up <S%G305><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> feast, <S%G1859><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> is <S%G4137><s%> not yet <S%G3768><s%> fulfilled. <S%G4137><s%>"
Having <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> he stayed <S%G3306><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Galilee. <S%G1056><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brothers <S%G80><s%> had gone up <S%G305><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the feast, <S%G1859><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> he <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> went <S%G305><s%> up, <S%G305><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> publicly, <S%G5320><s%> but <S%G235><s%> as it were <S%G5613><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> secret. <S%G2927><s%>

The Jews <S%G2453><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> sought <S%G2212><s%> him <S%G846><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the feast, <S%G1859><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "Where <S%G4226><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> he? <S%G1565><s%>"

There <S%G2532><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> murmuring <S%G1112><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> him. <S%G846><s%> Some <S%G3588><s%> <S%G99999><s%> said, <S%G3754><s%> "He is <S%G2076><s%> a good man. <S%G18><s%>" Others <S%G243><s%> <S%G1161><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "Not <S%G3756><s%> so, <S%G235><s%> but he leads the multitude <S%G3793><s%> astray. <S%G4105><s%>"
Yet <S%G3305><s%> no one <S%G3762><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> openly <S%G3954><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> him <S%G846><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> of the Jews. <S%G2453><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when it was now <S%G2235><s%> the midst <S%G3322><s%> of the feast, <S%G1859><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went up <S%G305><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> taught. <S%G1321><s%>

The <S%G2532><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> therefore marveled, <S%G2296><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "How <S%G4459><s%> does this man <S%G3778><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> letters, <S%G1121><s%> having <S%G3129><s%> never <S%G3361><s%> been educated? <S%G3129><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore answered <S%G611><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532><s%> "My <S%G1699><s%> teaching <S%G1322><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> mine, <S%G1699><s%> but <S%G235><s%> his who sent <S%G3992><s%> me. <S%G3165><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> desires <S%G2309><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> his <S%G846><s%> will, <S%G2307><s%> he will know <S%G1097><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> the teaching, <S%G1322><s%> whether <S%G4220><s%> it is <S%G1473><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> if I <S%G1473><s%> am speaking <S%G2980><s%> from <S%G575><s%> myself. <S%G1683><s%>

He who speaks <S%G2980><s%> from <S%G575><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> seeks <S%G2212><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> glory, <S%G1391><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> he who seeks <S%G2212><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of him who sent <S%G3992><s%> him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> true, <S%G227><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> unrighteousness <S%G93><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Didn't <S%G1325><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> the law, <S%G3551><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> yet none <S%G3762><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> keeps <S%G4160><s%> the law? <S%G3551><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> do you seek <S%G2212><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%> me? <S%G3165><s%>"
The multitude <S%G3793><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> <S%G2532><s%> "You have <S%G2192><s%> a demon! <S%G1140><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> seeks <S%G2212><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%> you? <S%G4571><s%>"

If <S%G1487><s%> a boy <S%G444><s%> receives <S%G2983><s%> circumcision <S%G4061><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the Sabbath, <S%G4521><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> of Moses <S%G3475><s%> may <S%G3089><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> be broken, <S%G3089><s%> are you angry <S%G5520><s%> with me, <S%G1698><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> I made <S%G4160><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> completely <S%G3650><s%> healthy <S%G5199><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the Sabbath? <S%G4521><s%>
Don't <S%G3361><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> appearance, <S%G3799><s%> but <S%G235><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> righteous <S%G1342><s%> judgment. <S%G2920><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> Behold, <S%G1492><s%> he speaks <S%G2980><s%> openly, <S%G3954><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they say <S%G3004><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> to him. <S%G846><s%> Can <S%G3379><s%> it be that <S%G3754><s%> the rulers <S%G758><s%> indeed <S%G230><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> truly the Christ? <S%G5547><s%>

However <S%G235><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> where <S%G4159><s%> this man <S%G5126><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> from, <S%G1161><s%> but when <S%G3752><s%> the Christ <S%G5547><s%> comes, <S%G2064><s%> no one <S%G3762><s%> will know <S%G1097><s%> where <S%G4159><s%> he comes from. <S%G2076><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> cried <S%G2896><s%> out in <S%G1722><s%> the temple, <S%G2411><s%> teaching <S%G2532><s%> and saying, <S%G3004><s%> "You <S%G1492><s%> both <S%G2504><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> me, <S%G2504><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> where <S%G4159><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> from. <S%G2532><s%> I have <S%G2064><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> of <S%G575><s%> myself, <S%G1683><s%> but <S%G235><s%> he who sent <S%G3992><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> true, <S%G228><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> don't <S%G3756><s%> know. <S%G1492><s%>

Now <S%G1722><s%> on the last <S%G2078><s%> and <S%G3588><s%> greatest <S%G3173><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> of the feast, <S%G1859><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> cried <S%G2896><s%> out, <S%G3004><s%> "If <S%G1437><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> is thirsty, <S%G1372><s%> let him come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drink! <S%G4095><s%>

He who believes <S%G4100><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> me, <S%G1691><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> the Scripture <S%G1124><s%> has said, <S%G2036><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> within <S%G846><s%> him <S%G2836><s%> will flow <S%G4482><s%> rivers <S%G4215><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> living <S%G2198><s%> water. <S%G5204><s%>"

But <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G2036><s%> said this <S%G5124><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> those believing <S%G4100><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> him <S%G846><s%> were <S%G3195><s%> to receive. <S%G2983><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> not yet <S%G3768><s%> given, <S%G3754><s%> because Jesus <S%G2424><s%> wasn't <S%G1392><s%> yet <S%G3764><s%> glorified. <S%G1392><s%>

Many <S%G4183><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> when they heard <S%G191><s%> these words, <S%G3056><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> truly <S%G230><s%> the prophet. <S%G4396><s%>"

Others <S%G243><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the Christ. <S%G5547><s%>" But <S%G1161><s%> some <S%G243><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "What, <S%G1063><s%> does <S%G3361><s%> the Christ <S%G5547><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> Galilee? <S%G1056><s%>

So <S%G3767><s%> there arose <S%G1096><s%> a division <S%G4978><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> them <S%G846><s%> would have <S%G2309><s%> arrested <S%G4084><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> but <S%G235><s%> no one <S%G3762><s%> laid <S%G1911><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

The officers <S%G5257><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> "No <S%G3763><s%> man <S%G444><s%> ever <S%G3779><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> man! <S%G444><s%>"

The Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> "You <S%G5210><s%> aren't <S%G4105><s%> also <S%G3361><s%> led <S%G2532><s%> astray, <S%G4105><s%> are you?
Have <S%G4100><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the rulers <S%G758><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the Pharisees? <S%G5330><s%>
But <S%G235><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> that doesn't <S%G3361><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> is <S%G1526><s%> accursed. <S%G1944><s%>"
